short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tressel makes it easy to sync your Kindle highlights and quickly send notes/highlights to your second brain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Tressel extension makes it easy to import/sync your Kindle highlights and quickly send notes/highlights to your second brain

To quickly capture a note:
- Open the Chrome extension popup (by clicking on the Tressel icon in the top-right toolbar)
- Or select some text in your browser and right click to quickly save it to Tressel

Syncing Kindle highlights is as easy as three simple steps:

1. Subscribe to Tressel (a Premium subscription is required)
2. Copy your personal access token into the Chrome extension's settings
3. Login to Amazon

And you're done! Your highlights will be automatically & seamlessly synced to Tressel and all your connected export integrations.
